document.full_text: regulators are moving to lift a veil of secrecy over a key constituency on wall street a year after the "flash crash," but how much disclosure should be required of high-frequency traders remains an open question.
document.title: high-frequency aura lifts year after "flash crash"
lines_and_colors: regulators are moving to lift a veil of secrecy over a key constituency on wall street a year after the "flash crash," but how much disclosure should be required of high-frequency traders remains an open question.
